snippet: Environmental regulations have not been an important cause of job losses, a California State Senate report, due to be released on Monday, concludes.         The report, to be issued by the Office of Research of the Democrat-controlled Senate based...
lead_paragraph: Environmental regulations have not been an important cause of job losses, a California State Senate report, due to be released on Monday, concludes. The report, to be issued by the Office of Research of the Democrat-controlled Senate based its conclusions on a review of previous research and data.

headline.main: Doubts on Tying Job Loss To Laws on Environment
